content.name: Мод da ku AI tweaks
content.author: deadair, kuertee
content.description: Мод da ku AI tweaks расширяет возможности игры и добавляет улучшения геймплея.

text.description: Combined Kuertee's Attack AI Tweaks mod and DeadAIR's AI Tweaks mod. Attack AI Tweaks: all ships avoid high-risk enemies, L/XL ships step forward on no damage, L/XL withdraw on damage. Read-me: https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/839 DeadAIRAITweaks read-me: https://github.com/kuertee/x4-mod-da-ku-ai-tweaks/blob/master/deadairaitweaks-read-me.md
